title: Local Hour: No Chance Toilet Pants
description:
David Samson joins us for a local hour that begins with a lot of talk about the cough button. David and the crew dive into the MLB postseason ratings, Black Friday NFL on Amazon, Jim Irsay vs. Dan Snyder, Price Gouging vs. Dynamic Pricing, and why Dan is bad at business.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
